page.title: 07KELMSCOTT LEISURE CENTRE.
page.content: Kelmscott Leisure Centre has been open for about 2 years. It has many sports available such as squash,badminton,football,a gym in fact most of the sports that you can think of except water sports.The most popular sport for men is football. Women like keepfit classes. Many clubs use Kelmscott.Waltham Forest Gym Club uses the centre as well as Leyton Badminton Club. The most popular day at Kelmscott is Wednesday. Adults use the facilities most. In the gymnasium they have a gym pit with sponge cubes in it so you can practice and you won't hurt yourself. The pit is about 8 feet deep. The centre has a school and a bar.It doesn't have a cafe,only a drinks machine.If children are bored they can go to Kelmscott where there are lots of games to play.
